description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治家、军事人物，北洋军阀“晋系”领袖。自1911年辛亥革命后长期管辖山西省，历时38年。曾任中华民国行政院院长、国防部部长及总统府资政等职务。
description.en: A Chinese politician and military figure, leader of the "Jin clique" of warlords. He ruled Shanxi Province for 38 years after the 1911 Xinhai Revolution. He served as Premier of the Republic of China, Minister of National Defense, and Senior Advisor to the Presidential Office.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物、军事将领，曾任行政院院长、国防部部长。
description.en: A politician and general of the Republic of China, who served as Premier and Minister of National Defense.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物、军事将领，曾任行政院院长。
description.en: A politician and general of the Republic of China, who served as Premier.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物、军事将领，桂系领袖，曾任中华民国代总统。
description.en: A politician and general of the Republic of China, leader of the New Guangxi clique, who served as acting President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治家及军事家，曾任中华民国总统。
description.en: A Chinese politician and military leader who served as the leader of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾于阎锡山内阁担任行政院副院长。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China who served as Vice Premier in Yan Xishan's cabinet.

description.zh-cn: 阎锡山的正妻。
description.en: The wife of Yan Xishan.

description.zh-cn: 阎锡山的妾。
description.en: The concubine of Yan Xishan.

description.zh-cn: 日本培养陆军军官的学校。
description.en: The principal officer training school for the Imperial Japanese Army.

description.zh-cn: 清末由孙中山等组织的革命团体，为中国国民党前身。
description.en: A secret society and underground resistance movement founded by Sun Yat-sen and others in the late Qing dynasty, the predecessor of the Kuomintang.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，阎锡山的好友。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China and a close friend of Yan Xishan.

description.zh-cn: 清朝末年官员，时任山西巡抚，在太原起义中被革命军所杀。
description.en: An official in the late Qing dynasty, serving as the governor of Shanxi, who was killed by revolutionary forces during the Taiyuan Uprising.

description.zh-cn: 清末军事将领，革命党人。曾与阎锡山策划组织燕晋联军，后遇刺身亡。
description.en: A military general and revolutionary in the late Qing dynasty. He planned to form the Yan-Jin Allied Army with Yan Xishan but was assassinated.

description.zh-cn: 辛亥革命时期由吴禄贞和阎锡山商议组建的革命军队，旨在阻止袁世凯进京，后因吴禄贞遇刺而夭折。
description.en: A planned revolutionary army during the Xinhai Revolution, to be formed by Wu Luzhen and Yan Xishan to prevent Yuan Shikai from entering Beijing. The plan was aborted after Wu's assassination.

description.zh-cn: 1911年11月7日，时任第六镇统制的吴禄贞在石家庄遇刺身亡的事件。
description.en: The event of the assassination of Wu Luzhen, commander of the 6th Division, in Shijiazhuang on November 7, 1911.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国北洋军阀，直系首领。曾在辛亥革命后奉袁世凯之命率军进攻山西。
description.en: A warlord of the Republic of China and leader of the Zhili clique. He led troops to attack Shanxi on Yuan Shikai's orders after the Xinhai Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国初期重要政治及军事人物，曾任中华民国临时大总统、正式大总统。
description.en: An important political and military figure in the early Republic of China, who served as the provisional and official President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代民主革命家，中国国民党创始人，中华民国国父。
description.en: A Chinese revolutionary, statesman, and founding father of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 袁世凯试图恢复中国君主制的政治运动。
description.en: An attempt by Yuan Shikai to restore monarchy in China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国北洋军阀，曾于1917年发动复辟，拥立溥仪登基。
description.en: A warlord of the Republic of China, known for attempting to restore the Qing dynasty by reinstalling Puyi in 1917.

description.zh-cn: 由孙中山领导，反对段祺瑞北洋政府的政治运动。
description.en: A political movement led by Sun Yat-sen against the Beiyang government of Duan Qirui.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治家，皖系军阀首领。
description.en: A politician and warlord of the Republic of China, leader of the Anhui clique.

description.zh-cn: 由中国国民党领导、旨在统一中国的军事行动。
description.en: A military campaign led by the Kuomintang to unify China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国北洋军阀，奉系首领。
description.en: A warlord of the Republic of China and leader of the Fengtian clique.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国北洋军阀，西北军领袖。曾与阎锡山联合发动中原大战。
description.en: A warlord of the Republic of China and leader of the Guominjun. He allied with Yan Xishan to launch the Central Plains War.

description.zh-cn: 1930年在中国发生的一场大规模军阀混战，由阎锡山、冯玉祥等地方实力派联合发动，反对南京国民政府主席蒋介石。
description.en: A large-scale civil war in 1930 between the coalition of regional commanders, including Yan Xishan and Feng Yuxiang, and the Nationalist government in Nanjing led by Chiang Kai-shek.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事将领，奉系军阀张作霖之子。其在中原大战中的倒戈导致阎锡山、冯玉祥联军失败。
description.en: A military general of the Republic of China, son of warlord Zhang Zuolin. His intervention in the Central Plains War led to the defeat of the Yan-Feng coalition.

description.zh-cn: 20世纪30至40年代中国抵抗日本全面侵略的战争。
description.en: The war of resistance fought by China against a full-scale invasion by Japan from the 1930s to the 1940s.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的高级领导人之一。抗战初期曾与阎锡山合作。
description.en: A senior leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China. He cooperated with Yan Xishan in the early stages of the Anti-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的军事家、政治家，中华人民共和国元帅。抗战初期曾与阎锡山合作，后在国共内战中率部攻占太原。
description.en: A military leader and politician of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, a Marshal of the PRC. He cooperated with Yan Xishan in the early Anti-Japanese War and later led forces to capture Taiyuan during the Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争时期由阎锡山在山西成立的抗日团体。
description.en: An anti-Japanese organization established in Shanxi by Yan Xishan during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事将领，晋系重要将领之一。曾奉阎锡山之命参与百灵庙战役。
description.en: A military general of the Republic of China, a key commander in the Jin clique. He participated in the Battle of Bailingmiao under Yan Xishan's orders.

description.zh-cn: 绥远抗战期间，傅作义部对日伪军的一次重要胜利。
description.en: An important victory for Fu Zuoyi's troops against Japanese and collaborationist forces during the Suiyuan Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争初期在山西太原地区发生的一场大规模战役，由阎锡山指挥。
description.en: A large-scale battle that took place in the Taiyuan area of Shanxi during the early stages of the Second Sino-Japanese War, commanded by Yan Xishan.

description.zh-cn: 1939年，阎锡山试图清除山西新军中的中共党员，导致新军公开叛变倒向共产党的事件。
description.en: In 1939, Yan Xishan's attempt to purge CCP members from the Shanxi New Army led to an open mutiny where the New Army defected to the Communists.

description.zh-cn: 第二次国共内战初期，解放军与阎锡山部队在山西上党地区的一次战役，以解放军完胜告终。
description.en: A campaign between the PLA and Yan Xishan's forces in the Shangdang area of Shanxi during the early Chinese Civil War, ending in a decisive PLA victory.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的主要武装力量。
description.en: The principal military force of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 第二次国共内战末期，中国人民解放军为攻占阎锡山固守的太原而发起的战役，最终攻克太原，结束了阎锡山在山西的统治。
description.en: A campaign launched by the People's Liberation Army to capture Taiyuan, defended by Yan Xishan, during the late Chinese Civil War. The capture of the city ended Yan's rule in Shanxi.

description.zh-cn: 阎锡山亲信，曾任山西省政府代主席。在太原被解放军攻克后自杀。
description.en: A confidant of Yan Xishan who served as the acting chairman of the Shanxi Provincial Government. He committed suicide after Taiyuan was captured by the PLA.

description.zh-cn: 阎锡山的堂妹，曾任山西省妇女会理事长。在太原被解放军攻克后自杀。
description.en: Yan Xishan's paternal cousin, who served as the head of the Shanxi Women's Association. She committed suicide after Taiyuan was captured by the PLA.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，CC系领袖之一。曾激烈反对阎锡山提出的土地改革建议。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China and one of the leaders of the CC Clique. He strongly opposed Yan Xishan's land reform proposal.

description.zh-cn: 中国山西省忻州市下辖的县，为阎锡山的出生地。
description.en: A county under the administration of Xinzhou, Shanxi, China, and the birthplace of Yan Xishan.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的首都。阎锡山在此度过晚年并逝世。
description.en: The capital of the Republic of China. Yan Xishan spent his later years and passed away here.

description.zh-cn: 阎锡山于1949年至1950年间担任中华民国行政院院长。
description.en: Yan Xishan served as the Premier of the Republic of China from 1949 to 1950.

description.zh-cn: 阎锡山接替何应钦出任行政院院长与国防部部长。
description.en: Yan Xishan succeeded He Yingqin as Premier and Minister of National Defense.

description.zh-cn: 陈诚接替阎锡山出任行政院院长。
description.en: Chen Cheng succeeded Yan Xishan as Premier.

description.zh-cn: 在李宗仁代理中华民国总统期间，阎锡山担任行政院院长。
description.en: Yan Xishan served as Premier while Li Zongren was the acting President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 在蒋中正复行视事后，阎锡山短暂担任其下的行政院院长，随后辞职。
description.en: After Chiang Kai-shek resumed his duties as President, Yan Xishan briefly served as his Premier before resigning.

description.zh-cn: 朱家骅在阎锡山内阁中担任行政院副院长。
description.en: Zhu Jiahua served as Vice Premier in Yan Xishan's cabinet.

description.zh-cn: 徐兰森是阎锡山的妾。
description.en: Xu Lansen was Yan Xishan's concubine.

description.zh-cn: 阎锡山与赵戴文是好友，曾一同携带炸弹回国参与革命。
description.en: Yan Xishan and Zhao Daiwen were close friends who returned to China together with bombs to participate in the revolution.

description.zh-cn: 阎锡山领导的太原起义中，时任山西巡抚陆钟琦被枪杀。
description.en: During the Taiyuan Uprising led by Yan Xishan, the then-governor of Shanxi, Lu Zhongqi, was shot and killed.

description.zh-cn: 在计划组建的燕晋联军中，阎锡山任副都督，吴禄贞为大都督。
description.en: In the planned Yan-Jin Allied Army, Yan Xishan was to be the Vice Commander-in-Chief under Commander-in-Chief Wu Luzhen.

description.zh-cn: 吴禄贞的遇刺身亡导致燕晋联军计划夭折。
description.en: The assassination of Wu Luzhen led to the abortion of the Yan-Jin Allied Army plan.

description.zh-cn: 辛亥革命后，曹锟奉袁世凯之命率军进攻阎锡山统治的山西。
description.en: After the Xinhai Revolution, Cao Kun, under Yuan Shikai's orders, led troops to attack Shanxi, which was controlled by Yan Xishan.

description.zh-cn: 1912年9月，孙中山视察山西时与阎锡山会面密谈。
description.en: In September 1912, Sun Yat-sen met with Yan Xishan for a private talk during his inspection of Shanxi.

description.zh-cn: 阎锡山为求自保，曾拥护袁世凯称帝。
description.en: For self-preservation, Yan Xishan supported Yuan Shikai's attempt to restore the monarchy.

description.zh-cn: 阎锡山通电征讨张勋，反对其复辟帝制。
description.en: Yan Xishan sent a telegram to denounce Zhang Xun, opposing his attempt to restore the monarchy.

description.zh-cn: 阎锡山奉段祺瑞之命派兵前往湖南，参与镇压护法运动。
description.en: Under Duan Qirui's orders, Yan Xishan dispatched troops to Hunan to participate in the suppression of the Constitutional Protection Movement.

description.zh-cn: 在北伐期间，蒋介石提请任命阎锡山为国民革命军北路总司令。
description.en: During the Northern Expedition, Chiang Kai-shek proposed appointing Yan Xishan as the Commander-in-Chief of the Northern Route of the National Revolutionary Army.

description.zh-cn: 在北伐战争中，阎锡山率领的国民革命军第三集团军与张作霖的奉系军队作战。
description.en: During the Northern Expedition, the Third Group Army of the National Revolutionary Army led by Yan Xishan fought against the Fengtian clique army of Zhang Zuolin.

description.zh-cn: 北伐期间，因冯玉祥拒绝支援并撤军导致晋军陷入险境，二人结怨。后在中原大战中联合反蒋，但关系复杂。
description.en: During the Northern Expedition, the two became rivals after Feng Yuxiang refused to provide support and withdrew his troops, putting Yan's army in danger. They later allied against Chiang Kai-shek in the Central Plains War, but their relationship remained complex.

description.zh-cn: 阎锡山联合冯玉祥等人发动中原大战，公开讨伐蒋介石。
description.en: Yan Xishan, in alliance with Feng Yuxiang and others, launched the Central Plains War to openly oppose Chiang Kai-shek.

description.zh-cn: 在中原大战中，张学良通电支持蒋介石并派兵入关，导致阎锡山、冯玉祥联军战败。
description.en: During the Central Plains War, Zhang Xueliang declared his support for Chiang Kai-shek and sent troops into Central China, leading to the defeat of the Yan-Feng coalition.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争初期，阎锡山采取联共抗日政策，与共产党人薄一波等人合作。
description.en: In the early stages of the Second Sino-Japanese War, Yan Xishan adopted a policy of uniting with the Communists to resist Japan and cooperated with figures like Bo Yibo.

description.zh-cn: 傅作义为晋系重要将领，长期在阎锡山麾下任职。
description.en: Fu Zuoyi was a key general of the Jin clique and served under Yan Xishan for a long time.

description.zh-cn: 阎锡山命令其麾下晋绥军对日伪军进行反击，取得了百灵庙战役的胜利。
description.en: Yan Xishan ordered his Jin-Sui Army to counter-attack Japanese and puppet forces, achieving victory in the Battle of Bailingmiao.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争期间，阎锡山作为第二战区司令长官，指挥了太原会战。
description.en: During the Second Sino-Japanese War, Yan Xishan, as the commander of the Second War Zone, commanded the Battle of Taiyuan.

description.zh-cn: 阎锡山试图收回由共产党控制的山西新军的权力，引发了新军的公开叛变，即晋西事变。
description.en: Yan Xishan's attempt to regain control over the Communist-influenced Shanxi New Army triggered an open mutiny, known as the Jinxi Incident.

description.zh-cn: 在上党战役中，阎锡山部被解放军击败，损失惨重。
description.en: In the Shangdang Campaign, Yan Xishan's forces were defeated by the PLA, suffering heavy losses.

description.zh-cn: 在第二次国共内战期间，中国人民解放军与阎锡山部在山西持续作战，并最终在太原战役中将其彻底击败。
description.en: During the second Chinese Civil War, the People's Liberation Army continuously fought against Yan Xishan's forces in Shanxi and ultimately defeated them in the Taiyuan Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 太原战役的失败终结了阎锡山在山西长达38年的统治。
description.en: The defeat in the Taiyuan Campaign ended Yan Xishan's 38-year rule over Shanxi.

description.zh-cn: 在太原被解放军攻克后，时任山西省政府代主席的梁化之自杀身亡。
description.en: After Taiyuan was captured by the PLA, Liang Huazhi, the acting chairman of the Shanxi Provincial Government, committed suicide.

description.zh-cn: 在太原被解放军攻克后，阎锡山的堂妹阎慧卿自杀身亡。
description.en: After Taiyuan was captured by the PLA, Yan Xishan's cousin Yan Huiqing committed suicide.

description.zh-cn: 阎慧卿是阎锡山的堂妹。
description.en: Yan Huiqing was Yan Xishan's paternal cousin.

description.zh-cn: 陈立夫激烈反对阎锡山在重庆提出的土地改革建议。
description.en: Chen Lifu strongly opposed the land reform proposal put forward by Yan Xishan in Chongqing.
